docblock.description: This class allows a user to match with all other mentors or mentees based on a scoring algorithm.
Constructor for Match object.
Executes matching algorithm and generates column-based multi-dimensional array of results.

tag.description: Column-based multi-dimensional array: UUID, score, full name, title, description.

docblock.description: Scores array of keywords against all mentors' experience keywords.

tag.description: Row-based multi-dimensional array: key = UUID & value = {score, full name, title, description}.

docblock.description: Scores array of keywords against all mentees' goal keywords.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Row-based multi-dimensional array: key = UUID & value = {score, full name, title, description}.
